node-cmd-promise
================

NodeJS interface to allow you to run bash commands asynchronously with Promises.

# Use

```JavaScript
const cmd = require('node-cmd-promise');

cmd('ls -a')
  .then((stdout, stderr) => {
    console.log("stdout", stdout);
    console.log("stderr", stderr);
  })
  .catch((error) => console.log("error", error))
```
